APPLYNO, OLDCARPRINTFLAG, CHANNELTIP, COOPERATESITECODE, APPLYSERIALNO, COMINSUREIND, TEAMMANAGER, PIONEERCODE, COMPOLICYINFO, PREFEEFLAG, POASERIALNO, SURVEYIND, PRIIND, PRINTDATE, OUTERSUBCOMPANYCODE, DEPARTMENTCODE, BASKETIND, FLOWID, INTERSALESMANREGISTERNO, INTERSALESMANCODE, SALESMANREGISTERNO, IMAGEATTACHIND, MONEYSUSPICIOUSIND, RELATETRADETYPE, BUSINESSGRADE, BUSINESSTYPESOURCE, RESOURCETYPE, BUSINESSSYMBOL, BUSINESSDETAILSYMBOL, AUTOUWFLAG, CARSAGMTCODE, SPECIALBUSINESS, REMARK2, RELOADPROFIT, BUSINESSSOURCETOP, HANDLERPERSON, BUSINESSSOURCESUB, CHANNELSOURCE, CHANNELSOURCESUB, TEAMCODE, RELATEPROPOSALNO, CARPARKNAME, PRIVINCE, CITY, AREA, BANKCODE, BANKSITECODE, ISUSECARSRATIO, LOCATIONCODE, SUMPREMIUMDETAX, SUMTAXPREMIUM, CHGSUMPREMIUMDETAX, CHGSUMTAXPREMIUM, APPLICATIONMODE, ASSOCIATEDNO, REALNAMEFLAG, DOUBLERECORDFLAG from GUPOLICYMAIN

SELECT DISTINCT gl.SALESMANCODE,gl.ISSUEDATE,gl.APPLICODE,gl.INSUREDCODE FROM gupolicymain gl
where gl.LASTMODIFYDATE >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{stampTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS:FF6')

select nvl(sum(gm.sumgrosspremium),0) from gupolicymain gm left join gupolicyrisk gr on gm.policyno = gr.policyno left join ggrisk grs on grs.riskcode = gr.riskcode left join gupolicyrelatedparty grp on gm.policyno = grp.policyno left join gppolicypayment gpp on gpp.policyno = gm.policyno
gr.enddate >= sysdate and gm.SURRENDERIND != 1
and gm.salesmancode in
#{item}

select count(gm.policyno) from gupolicymain gm left join gupolicyrisk gr on gm.policyno = gr.policyno left join ggrisk grs on grs.riskcode = gr.riskcode left join gupolicyrelatedparty grp on gm.policyno = grp.policyno left join gppolicypayment gpp on gpp.policyno = gm.policyno
gr.enddate >= sysdate and gm.SURRENDERIND != 1
and gm.salesmancode in
#{item}

SELECT sum(r.SUMINSURED) sumAmount, substr(r.RISKCODE,1,2) riskClass,RISKCODE,sum(r.sumgrosspremium) as sumPremium FROM GUPOLICYMAIN m left join GUPOLICYRISK r on m.POLICYNO = r.POLICYNO
m.APPLICODE in
#{item}
and m.SURRENDERIND = 0 and r.ENDDATE >= sysdate GROUP by r.RISKCODE
